US warns of imminent famine in Sudan, poised to be the deadliest in decades as global attention wavers
content: In Sudan's Darfur region, a famine in camps for displaced people worsened as warring factions obstructed aid efforts. US officials warned the crisis could become more severe than recent major famines. Aid organisations are calling for a cease-fire and increased aid access across Sudan. The conflict started in April 2023, escalating the humanitarian crisis.
summary: In Sudan's Darfur region, a famine in camps for displaced people worsened as warring factions obstructed aid efforts. US officials warned the crisis could become more severe than recent major famines. Aid organisations are calling for a cease-fire and increased aid access across Sudan. The conflict started in April 2023, escalating the humanitarian crisis.

title: Vietnam's president takes charge as Communist party chief, vows to intensify anti-corruption campaign
Tropical storm brewing: Emergency declared in Florida as heavy rain, strong winds expected
content: A disorganised weather system moved across Cuba, leading to strong winds, heavy rains, and ocean surges in Florida. Expected to become Tropical Storm Debby, it could deliver 12 inches of rain and strong winds as it heads north. Emergency orders are in place, and authorities urge residents to prepare with essential supplies.
summary: A disorganised weather system moved across Cuba, leading to strong winds, heavy rains, and ocean surges in Florida. Expected to become Tropical Storm Debby, it could deliver 12 inches of rain and strong winds as it heads north. Emergency orders are in place, and authorities urge residents to prepare with essential supplies.

title: Trump agrees to participate in debate with Kamala Harris on September 4
content: Former US President Donald Trump announced on his Truth Social platform that he accepted Fox News' invitation to debate Vice President Kamala Harris on September 4 in Pennsylvania. The debate will be moderated by Bret Baier and Martha MacCallum. Trump's previous ABC News debate with President Joe Biden was cancelled. Harris had expressed readiness to debate Trump following her nomination as the Democratic Party's presidential candidate.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump announced on his Truth Social platform that he accepted Fox News' invitation to debate Vice President Kamala Harris on September 4 in Pennsylvania. The debate will be moderated by Bret Baier and Martha MacCallum. Trump's previous ABC News debate with President Joe Biden was cancelled. Harris had expressed readiness to debate Trump following her nomination as the Democratic Party's presidential candidate.

'Screaming Woman' mummy: 3,500-year-old Egyptian mystery solved
content: A recent study led by Professor Sahar Saleem of Cairo University has revealed that the 'Screaming Woman' mummy discovered in 1935 may have experienced cadaveric spasm at death, preserving her agonised facial expression. The woman, embalmed with high-quality ingredients over 3,500 years ago, was found in a coffin among the tombs of the New Kingdom period near Luxor, Egypt.
summary: A recent study led by Professor Sahar Saleem of Cairo University has revealed that the 'Screaming Woman' mummy discovered in 1935 may have experienced cadaveric spasm at death, preserving her agonised facial expression. The woman, embalmed with high-quality ingredients over 3,500 years ago, was found in a coffin among the tombs of the New Kingdom period near Luxor, Egypt.

title: 21 Indian fishermen released from Sri Lanka prison return home safely
content: Twenty-one Indian fishermen were released from Sri Lankan custody and arrived in Chennai on Saturday, following negotiations by the Indian High Commission in Colombo. The incident involved a collision between a Sri Lankan naval vessel and an Indian fishing boat, resulting in one fisherman dead and another missing, with efforts underway to provide support to affected families.
summary: Twenty-one Indian fishermen were released from Sri Lankan custody and arrived in Chennai on Saturday, following negotiations by the Indian High Commission in Colombo. The incident involved a collision between a Sri Lankan naval vessel and an Indian fishing boat, resulting in one fisherman dead and another missing, with efforts underway to provide support to affected families.

title: These airlines cancel flights to Israel amid escalating tensions
Royal ceasefire: Prince William had sent 'last-minute text' to his brother Harry after Queen Elizabeth's death
content: Prince William and Prince Harry, estranged for years, surprised fans by reuniting publically two years ago. Following Queen Elizabeth's death, the brothers, accompanied by their wives, viewed tributes and greeted the public at Windsor. William extended an olive branch via a last-minute text to Harry, marking their first public joint appearance since the Sussexes moved to the US, showing unity during national mourning.
summary: Prince William and Prince Harry, estranged for years, surprised fans by reuniting publically two years ago. Following Queen Elizabeth's death, the brothers, accompanied by their wives, viewed tributes and greeted the public at Windsor. William extended an olive branch via a last-minute text to Harry, marking their first public joint appearance since the Sussexes moved to the US, showing unity during national mourning.

Kyle Rittenhouse says he won't vote for Trump. 12 hours later, he's 100% behind MAGA
content: "I am confident he will be the strong ally gun owners need to defend our Second Amendment rights...I'm 100% behind Donald Trump and encourage every gun owner to join me in helping send him back to the White House," Kyle Rittenhouse said 12 hours after he announced that he won't vote for Trump and Trump has bad advisers on Second Amendment.
summary: "I am confident he will be the strong ally gun owners need to defend our Second Amendment rights...I'm 100% behind Donald Trump and encourage every gun owner to join me in helping send him back to the White House," Kyle Rittenhouse said 12 hours after he announced that he won't vote for Trump and Trump has bad advisers on Second Amendment.
